title: Still waiting for Kindred.
body:
I miss the days when champions came out on the day they were scheduled to be released on.
Also no champion spotlight, nice Riot.

replies.body: All that Riot has stated about a "release date" is "during patch 5.19", there's no specified release date.
they never said kindred would be released at the start of patch 5.19

they also didnt lower lulus price. such a fuckin greedy company i swear, waiting to build more hype for the new champ as well as prolonging the time another champ becomes traditionally cheaper, its genius....
